Two agricultural fields were chosen for this evaluation test - a sugar beet (*Beta vulgaris* L.) field with significant heterogeneity in soil properties, and a winter wheat (*Triticum aestivum* L.) field with relatively homogeneous soil (\@ref(fig:study-area) (b)). Eddy covariance and meteorological towers are installed in both fields as part of the ongoing monitoring of agroecosystem dynamics. Measurements were performed in July under clear sky conditions.
